title: TOP 10 HIDDEN GEMS IN YOUR TRACTOR MANUAL!

tasks.task: Observing and performing safety checks on agricultural machinery.
subtasks: Checking tire direction and ensuring they are installed correctly for direction of travel.
Reversing PTO engagement procedures based on tractor series (1025 vs X738).
Identifying procedures to safely extricate a stuck tractor, avoiding overturning risks.
Understanding service intervals for extended maintenance delays.
Regularly greasing machine components to prevent wear and tear.
Adjusting Roll-Over Protective Structures (ROPS) based on operational needs and seatbelt usage.
Properly closing the fuel shutoff valve when transporting the tractor on a trailer.
Utilizing different bucket positions for optimal operation in forward vs reverse directions.
Adjusting rear wheel positions for lateral stability and field maneuverability.
Managing load heights when removing material from piles to prevent instability or collapses.
